name: Commonwealth v. Eastern Diversified Metals Corporation, Appellant

parties: Commonwealth v. Eastern Diversified Metals Corporation, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order of the Commonwealth Court affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: William P. Thorn, with him Wolf, Bloch, Schorr and Solis-Gohen, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Eastern Diversified Metals Corporation, Appellant.
Argued May 22, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandekino, JJ.
William P. Thorn, with him Wolf, Bloch, Schorr and Solis-Gohen, for appellant.
Edward T. Baher, Deputy Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellee.
July 2, 1973:
